txt.en: The battle has begun on the northern flank. You should aid the defenders there and destroy the siege engines of the Enemy.
The battle has shifted to the southern flank. You should aid the defenders there and destroy the siege engines of the Enemy.
Mithrandir is on the wall atop the Great Gate.\n\nYou should talk to Mithrandir when you are ready to defend Minas Tirith.
The battle has moved to the Great Gate. You should defend it and work to repel Grond before it can reach the gates.
Defend the southern flank of the gate-wall
The Oathbreakers have swept over the Corsair host, driving them back in supernatural terror.
Defend the northern flank of the gate-wall
Talk to Mithrandir when you are ready
Elrohir and Elladan must survive the battle

The defenders of Gondor struggle to hold the line as Grond, the great ram of the Enemy, crawls towards the gate of Minas Tirith.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Gain Merit from:</rgb>
- Defend the gates of Minas Tirith
- Keep soldiers of Gondor alive
- Defend supplies and armaments
- Protect siege weapons and barricades
- Topple the Enemy's siege towers
